content:
Detailed Guidelines on DGFT & Foreign Trade Services

Registration with Export Promotion Councils (EPCs) - 
Support in obtaining RCMC (Registration-cum-Membership Certificate).
Major EPCs:
CHEMEXCIL – Chemicals, Dyes, Allied Products.
AEPC – Apparel Exports.
Engineering Export Promotion Council (EEPC) – Engineering goods.
SEPC – Services Export Promotion Council.
RCMC is mandatory for claiming incentives and participating in export promotion programs.

DGFT & Foreign Trade Services – Guidelines Table:
